hero.title: Don’t Waste Food. Share It with Someone in Need.
hero.description: Whether it’s from a function, restaurant, or your kitchen — your extra food can feed someone tonight. Join us to fight hunger.

mission.title: Bridging Hunger & Food Waste
mission.description: Every day, quality food is wasted while millions remain hungry. Our mission is to bridge this gap by connecting food donors with NGOs that serve those in need. We believe no good food should go to waste when it can feed someone in need. Join us to make a difference — one meal at a time.

whoCanJoin.title: Who Can Join Us?
whoCanJoin.subtitle: Everyone has a role to play in fighting hunger.

items.title: Individuals
items.desc: Anyone can donate home-cooked food and be part of our mission.

items.title: NGOs
items.desc: Work with us to deliver food to the right people at the right time.

items.title: Restaurants
items.desc: Share surplus meals and reduce food waste.

items.title: Event Managers
items.desc: Donate leftover food from large gatherings like weddings.

items.title: Volunteers
items.desc: Join hands to pick up and deliver food with care.

items.title: Corporates
items.desc: Support through CSR by partnering with regular donations.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Not sure what you need? The team at Square Events will be happy to listen to you and suggest event ideas you hadn't considered.
contact.formTitle: We’d love to hear from you!
